entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Los Angeles location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-08-19 10:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-08-19 14:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Los Angeles instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.
This will need to be re-scheduled. services should be restored

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing Bare Metal system changes in the Silicon Valley location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-08-18 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-08-18 22:00:00 UTC

Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.
Thank you for your patience. At this time all functionality has been restored and Bare Metal controls enabled

Event Type: Network Maintenance

We are performing BareMetal system changes in the Miami location during the following maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-08-17 16:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-08-17 22:00:00 UTC


Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.
